attributes.action: Stop the Scottish Government wasting £20 million on another referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Find away of making sure the SNP/ Scottish Government are unable to waste money on breaking up the united kingdom.
Ensuring that money given to Scotland is used correctly into the services that need it.  Rather than trying to break us up. 
They use their own money not tax payers money to fund this referendum
attributes.background: Looking to put a stop to SNP being allowed to waste money that can be used for the people of Scotland. Use the money to improve Scotland not to destroy Scotland

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The UK Government has not given the Scottish Government or Parliament powers to schedule a referendum on independence. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling for the Government not to allow any future referendums on Scottish independence.
